name: The Meanderthal # 1
description:
This is a cosmic platformer where you play The Meanderthal, a space barbarian. 

Includes the following:

  • A bunch of interactive comic book cutscenes.
  • Flying through space a lot.
  • 8 crazy fights including 2 bosses.
  • 30 minutes of playtime....? (fights may be challenging)
  • Epic cosmic story inspired by 70's space comics.
  • Veggie village and NPCs.
  • Cool creatures by cartoonist William Cardini.
  • An exclusive comic book cover:

    • ---- Gamepad is very recommended! ----

    If you use keyboard, there are two (flawed) control schemes: 

    • WASD + SPACE to jump, E for attack (The one-handed scheme)
    • Arrow Keys + Z to jump, X to attack (The unnatural  "right hand to move" scheme)

    PRESS F11 to toggle windowed mode.

    There is a Mac version that has not been tested much!

    Thank You & Enjoy!

    (btw, this is "issue #1" of a continuing series. The Meanderthal will return!)
